abstract.text: The base class that handles all direct Bluesky-related functionality of the ATProtoKit
API library.
Lists a user account’s blob CID hashes.
Retrieves an array of tagged feeds and users.
Gets all of the user account’s followers.
Mutes a list of user accounts.
Retrieves information about several feed generators.
Retrieving a feed list by a user.
Sign in with a Bluesky account, send a post, and view the account’s posts.
Updates the email address associated with the user’s account.
Lists all of the App Passwords in a user’s account.
Retrieves the lists created by the user account.
Develop and manage client and server-side applications for the AT Protocol and Bluesky.
Retrieves an array of posts.
Lists notifications of the user account.
Retrieves the public relationship between the two user accounts.
Specifies the logger that will be used for emitting log messages.
Writes a record in the repository, which may replace a previous record.
Gets the user account’s starter packs.
Gets a starter pack.
Counts the number of unread notifications.
Updates the server of the user seeing the notification.
Registers the user to receive push notifications from the server to the client.
Retrieves the invite codes from the user’s account.
Retrieves information about the sign up queue location.
Imports repository data.
Retrieves the skeleton results of posts.
Searches for and validates a record from the repository.
Gets a repository’s latest commit CID.
Gets a list of suggested users.
Gets a skeleton of suggested actors.
Requests a token to be emailed to the user in order to update their email address.
Activates the user’s account.
Retrieves the results of a search query.
Assigns a PLC task to modify specific values in the document of the requesting
DID document.
Requests the crawling service to begin crawling the repositories.
Retrieves the required information of a Personal Data Server’s (PDS) DID document
for migration.
Sends an email containing a way to reset the user’s password.
Lists any missing blobs attached to the user account.
Requests an email confirmation to verify the email belongs to the user.
Unmutes a user account.
Defines a protocol for configurations in the
API library.
Updates a communication template.
Checks the status of the user’s account.
Creates an invite code.
Requests the server to delete the user’s account via email.
Retrieves information about a given feed generator.
Views a given feed generator.
Retrieves all of the user account’s likes.
Notifies the crawling service to re-index or resume crawling.
Retrieves like records of a specific subject.
Lists a collection’s records within a respository.
Gets an array of starter packs.
Deletes a record attached to a user account..
Edits the preferences for the user.
Revokes an App Password from a user’s account.
Confirms an email by the user using the token that was sent to the user’s email inbox.
Attempts to authenticate the user into the server.
Looks for user profiles (actors) matching the search term.
Unmutes a list of user accounts.
Receive the preferences of a given user.
Describes the repository.
Gets information about various labeler services.
Retrieves a token from a requested service.
Sends interactions to a feed generator.

abstract.text: Reserves a signing key for the respository.
Looks for user profiles (actors) matching the prefixed search term.
Represents an authenticated user session within the AT Protocol. Optional.
Creates a record attached to a user account.
Unmutes a thread.
Validates a PLC operation.
Retrieves the skeleton results of actors (users).
The base class that handles the the Bluesky chat functionality of the ATProtoKit API library.
Identifies mutual followers.
Mutes a thread.
Retireves recent posts and reposts from a given feed.
Gets a repository in a .car format.
Retrieves a skeleton for a feed generator.
Deletes a user account from the server.
Gets a record as a .car format.
Lists all decentralized identifiers (DIDs), revisions, and commit CID hashes for all of the
outputted repositiories.
Retrieves the user account’s posts and reposts.
Retrieves an array of users who have reposted a given post.
Retrieves an array of globally popular feed generators.
Gets detailed profiles of several users.
The base class that handles the main functionality of the
API library.
Asks for an email that contains a code for a signed PLC operation.
Retrieves the status for a repository in the Personal Data Server (PDS).
Sends a request to be verified with a code from the user’s messaging app.
Gets all of the accounts the user account follows.
Deactivates the user’s account.
Gets all of the block records from the user account.
Retrieves a post thread.
Creates an App Password for the user’s account.
A class containing all administrator and moderator functionality of the
API library.
Retrieves a blob from a given record.
Grabs the moderator list that the user account is currently muting.
Creates several invite codes.
Gets a repository’s blocks based on the CID hashes.
Applies creation, updates, and deletion transactions into the repository in batches.
Gets the list of user accounts that requesting user account is suggested to follow.
Mutes a user account.
Resets the user’s account password.
Retrieves a decentralized identifier (DID) based on a given handle from a specified
Personal Data Server (PDS).
Sets notification preferences for a user account.

Replaces the user’s current handle with a new one.
Gets information about a given feed generator.

Gets the moderator lists that the user account is blocking.
